definition.de:
Ein Text, der dem Publikum mitteilt, wie es den Ersteller des Videos/Inhalts unterstützen kann.
siehe [peertube documentation](https://framagit.org/framasoft/peertube/documentation/-/blob/master/api-activitypub.md#supported-objects-1)
definition.en:
A text to tell the audience how to support the video/content creator.
see [peertube documentation](https://framagit.org/framasoft/peertube/documentation/-/blob/master/api-activitypub.md#supported-objects-1)
definition.fr:
Un texte pour indiquer au public comment soutenir le créateur de la vidéo/du contenu.
voir [peertube documentation](https://framagit.org/framasoft/peertube/documentation/-/blob/master/api-activitypub.md#supported-objects-1)
definition.es:
Un texto para indicar al público cómo apoyar al creador del vídeo/contenido.
ver [peertube documentation](https://framagit.org/framasoft/peertube/documentation/-/blob/master/api-activitypub.md#supported-objects-1)

example.de:
```json 
{
  "type": "Video",
  "views": 35,
  "support": "Pay me a coffee when you see me",
  "waitTranscoding": true
}```
example.en:
```json 
{
  "type": "Video",
  "views": 35,
  "support": "Pay me a coffee when you see me",
  "waitTranscoding": true
}```
example.fr:
```json 
{
  "type": "Video",
  "views": 35,
  "support": "Pay me a coffee when you see me",
  "waitTranscoding": true
}```
example.es:
```json 
{
  "type": "Video",
  "views": 35,
  "support": "Pay me a coffee when you see me",
  "waitTranscoding": true
}```

title.de: ActivityPub und Freunde - Eine Ontolgie des Fediverse
title.en: ActivityPub and friends – An ontology of the fediverse
title.fr: ActivityPub et ses amis - Une ontologie du fediverse
title.es: ActivityPub y sus amigos - Una ontología del fediverso
